definition: area in the Shangcheng district of Hangzhou
open sluice gate/(toll) station/boarding gate (airport etc)/(fig.) gateway (access point)
gear/brake/sluice/lock (on waterway)/electric switch or circuit breaker
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: Three guys died. When they got to the pearly gates.
sentences.chinese: 三個人死後，當他們到了淺藍色的閘口。

sentences.english: Roundtrip transfer between Kinabalu Park HQ & Gate.
sentences.chinese: 來回神山公園總部至登山閘口之接送。

sentences.english: There are usually lots of small fish at the water-gate.
sentences.chinese: 閘口往往會聚集許多小魚。

sentences.english: As per the plan, the new gatehouse is scheduled for completion by this October.
sentences.chinese: 根據計劃，新閘口將於今年的十月份竣工。

definition: Man Kam To (place in Hong Kong)
